thread.section_title: Planet of the Vapes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Planet of the Vapes | planetofthevapes.com | 5 of 77
thread.title: Brandon
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Brandon

author: Brandon
title: Brandon
text:
Would recommend to anyone who is looking to get a digital vape. This is a great middle ground between something such as a digital volcano and a Buddha. Doesn't feel cheap and it's very easy to use. Comes with some extra parts, a whip, and two bags. There are usually 2 or 3 glass pieces being used during any given time so I wouldn't recommend it as a party vape, instead keep it for solo use or to use with a few friends.
The price was fantastic and shipping only took a few days, I'm sure it would have gotten here even faster if I didn't order it on Saturday night.
